attributes.action: Abolish English GCSE, and promote ICT
attributes.additional_details: Computers, not English are now the universal language, and time could be spent learning how to use them, rather than insulting people by making them learn their own language. Teaching English does not boost the economy, help the environment, help people in their job prospects, or benefit society. The government should ban English GCSE, and retrain English teachers to teach ICT
